ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc41:0.2_0: The nuns’ rules and their analysis
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc41:0.3_0: The chapter on offenses entailing confession
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc41:0.5_0: 41. The training rule on royal houses
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc41:1.1_0: At one time when the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in the Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc41:1.2_0: artwork had been installed in the pleasure house in King Pasenadi of Kosala’s park.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc41:1.3_0: Many people visited the pleasure house,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc41:1.4_0: as did the nuns from the group of six.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc41:1.5_0: People then complained and criticized those nuns,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc41:1.6_0: “How can nuns visit a pleasure house? They are just like householders who indulge in worldly pleasures!”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc41:1.7_0: Nuns heard the complaints of those people,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc41:1.8_0: The nuns of few desires complained and criticized Thullanandā,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc41:1.9_0: “How could the nuns from the group of six do this?” ...
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc41:1.10_0: “Is it true, monks, that those nuns did this?”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc41:1.13_0: “... How could the nuns from the group of six do this?
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc41:1.14_0: This won’t give rise to confidence in those without it ...” ...
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc41:1.15_0: the Buddha said, “And, monks, the nuns should recite this training rule like this:
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc41:1.16.1_0: ‘If a nun visits a royal house or a pleasure house or a park or a garden or a lotus pond, she commits an offense entailing confession.’”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc41:2.1.4_0: ... The nun who has been given the full ordination in unanimity by both Sanghas through a legal procedure consisting of one motion and three announcements that is irreversible and fit to stand—this sort of nun is meant in this case.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc41:2.1.6_0: wherever one has been built for a king to entertain and enjoy himself.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc41:2.1.8_0: wherever one has been made for a people to entertain and enjoy themselves.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc41:2.1.10_0: wherever one has been made for a people to entertain and enjoy themselves.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc41:2.1.12_0: wherever one has been made for a people to entertain and enjoy themselves.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc41:2.1.14_0: wherever one has been made for a people to entertain and enjoy themselves.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc41:2.1.15_0: If she is on her way to visit them, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc41:2.1.16_0: Wherever she stands to see it, she commits an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc41:2.1.17_0: Every time she moves outside the range of sight and then sees it again, she commits an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc41:2.1.18_0: If she is on her way to visit any one of them, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc41:2.1.19_0: Wherever she stands to see it, she commits an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc41:2.1.20_0: Every time she moves outside the range of sight and then sees it again, she commits an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc41:2.2.2_0: if she sees it while remaining in a monastery;
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc41:2.2.3_0: if she sees it while coming or going;
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc41:2.2.4_0: if she goes when there is something to be done and then sees it;
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc41:2.2.5_0: They burn in times of trouble,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc41:2.2.7_0: if she is the first offender.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc41:2.2.8_0: The first rule, the training rule on fire, is finished.
